dialogue.text: B. Kyu? You're looking kinda rough there. Like, REALLY rough.
PJ... That is Love... my creator... but... something's terribly wrong with her.
ROUGH?! HAH! Is that what you call peak performance?! Rip me! Shred me! I'll ALWAYS be hotter than YOU!
Hotter...? Love, you feel... cold. What happened to you?
SILENCE! You... THING born of weakness! You couldn't POSSIBLY grasp TRUE beauty!
Yikes. Okay, definitely not winning Miss Congeniality today.
